# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="813fd-102">Salvarea mesajelor în Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="813fd-103">Nu se pot salva mesajele de e-mail în Outlook.com, dar aveţi posibilitatea să imprimaţi-le la un document PDF care poate salva pe PC-ul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="813fd-104">Utilitarul Microsoft imprima la PDF incluse în Windows 10 vă permite să imprimaţi orice mesaj de e-mail direct la un PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="813fd-105">Selectaţi mesajul pe care doriţi să salvaţi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="813fd-106">Selectaţi trei puncte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="813fd-107">la partea de sus a mesajului şi apoi selectaţi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="813fd-108">**Print**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="813fd-109">Selectaţi **printaţi** din nou, şi din meniul derulant imprimantă, selectaţi **Print Microsoft în PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="813fd-110">Selectaţi **printaţi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="813fd-111">Introduceţi un nume de fişier, apoi selectaţi **Save**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="813fd-112">**Notă:** Acest lucru nu este recomandat pe computere partajate sau publice şi alţi utilizatori ar putea avea acces la orice PDF-uri vă salva PC-ul şi nu ştergeţi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="813fd-113">Pentru mai multe informaţii despre imprimarea, a se vedea [mesajele de e-mail de imprimare, accesorii, şi calendare în Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="813fd-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
